lead_paragraph: The NHL led the way with a moment of silence prior to Game Three of the Stanley Cup Finals as professional sports around the United States paid tribute to Muhammad Ali on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Stanley Cup Finals Take a Pause as Sport Remembers Ali
headline.main: Stanley Cup Finals Take a Pause as Sport Remembers Ali
